other_tests.findings: A homozygous nucleotide substitution, 1718C / H11022T, in exon 11 of the LMNA gene, resulting in S573L mutation.
Occasional misshapen nuclei observed in skin fibroblasts.
Osteopenia of the hands, shoulder joints, and pelvic bones; hyperostosis frontalis; calcifications of tendons at multiple sites.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progression of degenerative changes in the knees noted over time.
